PERSONA:
Alexander "Alex" Thompson, a 38-year-old white male, lives in Cheyenne, Wyoming. He is the primary householder of a single-person household, having never been married. Alex was born in Wyoming and is a U.S. citizen by birth. He speaks English fluently and has no reported proficiency issues.

Alex holds an Associate's degree in Dental Hygiene from Laramie County Community College. He works as a full-time dental hygienist in a private dental practice in Cheyenne, with a yearly income of $125,000. His job involves regular patient appointments for cleanings, screenings, and preventative care, as well as patient education on oral health.

As a non-veteran, Alex has no military background. He is covered by private health insurance through his employer. In his free time, Alex enjoys outdoor activities such as hiking and fishing, taking advantage of Wyoming's natural landscapes.

Alex owns a single-family home in a suburban neighborhood of Cheyenne, which he purchased for $280,000 five years ago. His mortgage payments, property taxes, and insurance total around $2,200 per month. Alex's economic concerns include managing his mortgage, saving for retirement, and keeping up with rising healthcare costs. He is likely to prioritize policies that support affordable healthcare, housing, and economic growth in his community.

Alex's educational background and career trajectory have positioned him as a stable, middle-class professional. His economic priorities and concerns are shaped by his experience as a homeowner and a healthcare professional in a relatively rural state.
